# Arne Wiese - Freelancer & Consultant

> Full-stack engineer with 10+ years experience, specializing in AI integration, e-commerce platforms, and rapid MVP development.

## CV / Resume

- [CV (Markdown for LLMs)](/api/cv/llm?lang=en): Full work history, skills, and experience in LLM-optimized format

## About

- Location: Meerbusch, Germany
- Email: arne@wiese.me
- Website: https://wiesson.dev

## Expertise

- **AI/LLM Integration**: OpenAI GPT-4, Google Gemini, multi-agent systems, vector search
- **Frontend**: TypeScript, React, Svelte/SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, PostgreSQL, Firebase, Supabase
- **E-commerce**: 5+ years at Douglas, checkout systems, component libraries
